TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XamlReader extends System.Object

summary.span: 使用 WPF 默认 XAML 读取器和关联的 XAML 对象编写器读取 XAML 输入并创建对象图。

span.span: Reads XAML input and creates an object graph, using the WPF default XAML reader and an associated XAML object writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 同步方法是静态的但异步方法不是静态和需要的实例要使用的类。The synchronous methods are static, but the asynchronous methods are not static and require an instance of the class to use. 输出`Load`方法是单个对象，它表示创建的对象树或对象图的根对象。The output of the `Load` methods is a single object, which represents the root object of a created object tree or object graph. 对象创建的关系图通常会将其添加到 WPF 应用程序在运行时的现有对象树。Object graphs that are created by are typically added to the existing object tree of a WPF application at run time. 否则新的对象图，被视为出于的 WPF 应用程序模型断开连接。Otherwise the new object graph is considered disconnected for purposes of the WPF application model. 也就是说，不会呈现，并且不能访问使用任一对象树技巧作为应用于 WPF 应用程序的主对象树 (例如，Api ， ， )。This means that it does not render, and cannot be accessed using any of the object tree techniques as applied to the WPF application's main object tree (for example, the APIs , , ). 在对象树概念的详细信息，请参阅[WPF 中的树](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md)。For more information on object tree concepts, see [Trees in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md). 支持以下主要方案： supports the following primary scenarios: - **克隆对象工厂**： 没有附加机制，引用类型通常不能包含 WPF 对象树中的多个位置。**Cloning/object factory**: Without additional mechanisms, a reference type generally cannot be included in more than one position in a WPF object tree. (其他机制来提供对共享支持或在 WPF 中重新使用的示例包括基于的对象，或如支持通常可共享对象，引用为中的一个项。)一种方法克隆一个对象，它已在对象树是序列化对象使用。(Examples of additional mechanisms that offer support for sharing or re-use in WPF include objects that are based on , or support for commonly shareable objects such as that are referenced as an item from a .) One way to clone an object that is already in the object tree is to serialize the object using . 然后将其序列化的字符串作为输入用于调用，并将流或作为中介。You then use the serialized string as input for a call to , with a stream or as an intermediary. - **构造对象基于在实时信息**： 通常还有其他方法来使用晚期绑定或用户提供的输入来更改现有对象的状态。**Constructing objects based on just-in-time information**: There are often other ways to have late-binding or user-supplied input change the state of existing objects. 例如你无法使用相同的值来设置多个属性，或使用数据绑定。For example you could use the same value to set more than one property, or use data binding. 但如果你有其中甚至要创建的对象的类型为仅可确定在运行时或与用户交互的方案，然后通过在生成的字符串来创建此类对象输入通常是有用的技术。But if you have a scenario where even the type of object to create is only determinable at run time or with user interaction, then creating such an object by building up a string for input is often a useful technique. - **使用现有资源技术**:类型常用于其他框架或技术用于跨应用程序边界传输数据或对象或类似情况。**Using existing resource techniques**: The type is used frequently in other frameworks or technologies for transferring data or objects across application boundaries or for similar situations. 然后，可以使用技术来存储或获取最终用于你的应用程序的一部分中创建对象的 XAML 格式的数据。You can then use the techniques to store or obtain XAML-formatted data that you eventually use to create an object as part of your application. - **固定文档：**你的应用程序可能会加载以包含在 WPF 应用程序对象树和 UI 中的本地或下载 XPS 文档。**Fixed documents:** Your application might load local or downloaded XPS documents for inclusion in a WPF application object tree and UI. > [!NOTE] > 有时，此文档介绍对象图，而不是对象树。This documentation sometimes describes an object graph, as opposed to an object tree. 严格的父-子关系不始终存在中运行的时 WPF 应用程序的运行的时对象关系，因此对象图是更广泛适用的术语。A strict parent-child relationship does not always exist in the run time object relationships of a run time WPF application, so an object graph is a more widely applicable terminology. 但是，原因是 WPF 还包括两个不同的树概念化 Api (， ) 树隐喻仍充分地应用到 WPF 中的大多数现实情况。However, because WPF also includes two different tree conceptualization APIs (, ) the tree metaphor still applies adequately to most real-world cases in WPF. 从 XAML 语言角度来看但是，对象图通常是考虑如何将对象创建超出 XAML 中，因为 XAML 语言本身并不一定指定将关系的详细信息的帮助器类方法的最佳方式到再次树状结构。From the XAML language perspective however, the object graph is often the best way to think about how objects are created out of XAML, because the XAML language itself does not necessarily specify helper class methodologies that bring the relationships more into a tree structure again. ## 代码访问安全性、 宽松 XAML，以及 xamlreader 形式提供Code Access Security, Loose XAML, and XamlReader XAML 是一种直接表示对象实例化和执行的标记语言。XAML is a markup language that directly represents object instantiation and execution. 因此，在 XAML 中创建的元素能够像等效的生成代码那样与系统资源（如网络访问、文件系统 IO）进行交互。Therefore, elements created in XAML have the same ability to interact with system resources (network access, file system IO, for example) as the equivalent generated code does. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_net](~/includes/tla2sharptla-net-md.md)]安全框架[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_cas](~/includes/tlasharptla-cas-md.md)]。 supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_net](~/includes/tla2sharptla-net-md.md)] security framework [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_cas](~/includes/tlasharptla-cas-md.md)]. 这意味着在 Internet 区域中运行的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 内容具有缩减的执行权限。This means that [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content running in the internet zone has reduced execution permissions. “宽松型 XAML”（由 XAML 查看器在加载时解释的非编译 XAML 的页面）和 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] 通常在此 Internet 区域中运行，并且使用相同的权限集。"Loose XAML" (pages of noncompiled XAML interpreted at load time by a XAML viewer) and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] are usually run in this internet zone and use the same permission set. 但是，加载到完全受信任的应用程序中的 XAML 与承载应用程序具有相同的系统资源访问权限。However, XAML loaded in to a fully trusted application has the same access to the system resources as the hosting application does. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [WPF 部分信任安全性](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md)。For more information, see [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md). 有关这些语句的含义是应用程序设计必须使你决定要加载的 xaml 的信任决定。The implications of these statements for is that your application design must make trust decisions about the XAML you decide to load. 如果你要将加载不受信任的 XAML，请考虑实现你自己的沙盒技术来加载生成的对象图的方式。If you are loading XAML that is not trusted, consider implementing your own sandboxing technique for how you load the resulting object graph. 此外可以由部分信任代码调用。 can also be called by partial trust code. 在这种情况下，Internet 安全区域被应用于代码访问安全性。In this case, Internet security zone is applied for code access security. 如果加载的 XAML 中的任何内容无效 Internet 安全区域下，会引发一个 XAML 分析异常。If anything in the loaded XAML is invalid under Internet security zone, a XAML parse exception is thrown. XBAP 和部分信任级别的平台的其他情况下在其中是一部分与显式的部分信任的调用的执行，获取相同的异常行为。Under XBAP and other cases that are partial trust at the platform level, where is part of the execution, you get the same exception behavior as with explicit partial trust calls. ## WPF XAML、 XAML 读取器/编写器，和 XAML 语言版本控制WPF XAML, XAML Readers/Writers, and XAML Language Versioning [!INCLUDE[xaml2009](~/includes/xaml2009-md.md)] 包括语言功能，如和。 includes language features such as and . 您可以使用的签名`Load`或`Parse`来加载使用这些功能的 XAML。You can use signatures of `Load` or `Parse` to load XAML that uses these features. 但是，这些语言功能不支持针对需要标记编译的 XAML (如 XAML**页**生成 WPF 应用程序或涉及的生成操作中的标记编译任务任何 XAML 中的操作)。However, those language features are not supported for XAML that needs to be markup compiled (such as XAML for the **Page** build action in a WPF application, or any XAML that involves the markup compile task in the build actions). WPF 类型和 WPF 技术通常支持依赖于对 WPF 内部结构的访问的概念。WPF types and the WPF technology in general support concepts that rely on access to WPF internals. 例如，WPF 如何实施依赖项属性依赖于用于高效的类型成员查找内部技术。For instance, how WPF implements dependency properties relies on internal techniques for efficient type-member lookup. 对这些内部结构的访问通过读取和写入中提供的 Api 的 XAML和从命名空间和 PresentationFramework 程序集中。Access to these internals is enabled by the XAML reading and writing APIs provided in and from the namespace and PresentationFramework assembly. 但是，较低级别 XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器从 System.Xaml 程序集 (类基于， ) 不能访问到 WPF 内部结构。However, the lower-level XAML readers and XAML writers from the System.Xaml assembly (classes based on , ) do not have access to the WPF internals. 从 System.Xaml 对任何特定于 WPF 程序集没有依赖关系。There is no dependency from System.Xaml to any WPF-specific assembly. 无需 WPF 内部访问，System.Xaml 读取器和编写器无法正确加载或保存所有 WPF 类型基于 WPF 类型。Without access to the WPF internals, System.Xaml readers and writers cannot correctly load or save all WPF types, or types based on WPF types. 具体而言，System.Xaml 读取器和编写器不了解概念，如备份属性存储或 WPF 如何使用样式、 资源字典和模板的所有详细信息的 WPF 依赖项属性。In particular, the System.Xaml readers and writers do not understand concepts such as the WPF dependency property backing property store, or all the specifics of how WPF uses styles, resource dictionaries and templates. 因此，你可以选择以：Therefore you have a choice to make: - 如果您正在加载 WPF 类型和/或以任何方式的 BAML 形式使用 XAML，使用 PresentationFramework XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器。If you are loading WPF types, and/or you are using XAML in BAML form in any way, use the PresentationFramework XAML readers and XAML writers. - 如果你不依赖于任何 WPF 类型或 BAML 形式的 XAML，并不将另一种特定技术的 XAML 读取器或 XAML 编写器实现的原因，特定于该框架，则使用 System.Xaml XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器。If you are not relying on any WPF types or the BAML form of XAML, and are not using another specific technology's XAML reader or XAML writer implementation for reasons that are specific to that framework, use the System.Xaml XAML readers and XAML writers. ## System.Xaml 支持.NET 4 中的实现System.Xaml Backing Implementation in .NET 4 是 WPF 框架级别 XAML 分析器可调用的 API 图面。 is the callable API surface for the WPF framework-level XAML parser. 相同的基础 XAML 分析器还执行运行时 XAML 加载和分析 WPF 应用程序面向[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]。The same underlying XAML parser also performs the run-time XAML loading and parsing for WPF applications that target [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]. 如果你正面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]、 外部 API 相同，但实施部分都基于[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]在 System.Xaml 程序集中，从而提高了许多分析 XAML 的技术和报告的方面的常规 XAML 实现。If you are targeting [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the external API is the same, but parts of the implementation are built on the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] general XAML implementation in the System.Xaml assembly, which improves many of the technical and reporting aspects of parsing XAML. 面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]一定需要一个引用，以及实现的详细信息包括 System.Xaml，如报告的异常可能来自于 System.Xaml 定义的类型。Targeting [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] necessarily entails including System.Xaml as a reference, and details of implementation such as the exceptions reported may come from System.Xaml defined types. ## Examples 以下示例将转换到字符串使用类。The following example converts a into a string using the class. 然后会将字符串加载回使用静态方法类。The string is then loaded back into a using the static method on the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 异步的 XAML 加载操作最初将返回一个对象，它只是根对象。An asynchronous XAML load operation will initially return an object that is purely the root object. 异步，XAML 分析然后仍然存在，并在根目录下填充任何子对象。Asynchronously, XAML parsing then continues, and any child objects are filled in under the root. 这是典型的 WPF XAML 处理行为和该产品与对象生存期 WPF 概念交互相反。This is in contrast to the typical WPF XAML processing behavior and its interaction with WPF concepts of object lifetime. 中的典型 （非异步） 交互，返回一个元素并将其加载汇报之前都是包括所有子集合对象的所有属性。In the typical (non-async) interaction, all properties of an object including all child collections are filled before returning an element and reporting it as loaded. 该行为等同于自下而上的方法，用于创建的树的根对象所在的最后一个对象变为可用。That behavior equates to a bottom-up methodology for creating the tree where the root object is the last object to become available. 你通常会将返回的对象分配到 WPF 应用程序的对象树中的某个位置、 内容所知识可能仍会填入和如果作为 UI 的一部分公开的整个内容，则可能会导致增量布局更新。You typically would assign the returned object to some location in your WPF application's object tree, with the knowledge that content might still be filling in and might cause incremental layout updates if the entire content is exposed as part of the UI. 为此，它是典型隔离或虚拟化从 XAML，任何以异步方式加载的对象并使用特定于应用程序逻辑或应用程序状态通知时处理。For this reason it is typical to isolate or virtualize any asynchronously loaded objects from XAML, and to use application-specific logic or application state to notify when is handled. 为了使若要加载的 XAML 输入以异步方式，XAML 输入中的根元素必须包含的属性和值`x:SynchronousMode="Async"`。In order for to load XAML input asynchronously, the root element in the XAML input must contain the attribute and value `x:SynchronousMode="Async"`. 值被视为区分大小写。The value is treated as case sensitive. 如果 XAML 输入的根不包含`x:SynchronousMode="Async"`，不会引发异常，且调用处理为同步负载 (请参阅)。If the XAML input root does not contain `x:SynchronousMode="Async"`, no exception is thrown, and the call is processed as a synchronous load (see ). 每个实例只有一个异步加载操作类可以执行一次。Only one asynchronous load operation per instance of the class can be performed at a time. 如果多个异步操作，将尝试对同一个实例类引发。If more than one asynchronous operation is attempted on the same instance of the class an is thrown.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 对同一个 的多个加载操作用时挂起。

span.span: Multiple load operations are pending concurrently with the same .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 异步的 XAML 加载操作最初将返回一个对象，它只是根对象。An asynchronous XAML load operation will initially return an object that is purely the root object. 异步，XAML 分析然后仍然存在，并在根目录下填充任何子对象。Asynchronously, XAML parsing then continues, and any child objects are filled in under the root. 这是典型的 WPF XAML 处理行为和该产品与对象生存期 WPF 概念交互相反。This is in contrast to the typical WPF XAML processing behavior and its interaction with WPF concepts of object lifetime. 中的典型 （非异步） 交互，返回一个元素并将其加载汇报之前都是包括所有子集合对象的所有属性。In the typical (non-async) interaction, all properties of an object including all child collections are filled before returning an element and reporting it as loaded. 该行为等同于自下而上的方法，用于创建的树的根对象所在的最后一个对象变为可用。That behavior equates to a bottom-up methodology for creating the tree where the root object is the last object to become available. 你通常会将分配给返回的对象从到应用程序的对象树中的某个位置，所需知识内容可能仍会填入和如果作为的一部分公开的全部内容可能会导致增量布局更新UI。You typically would assign the returned object from to some location in your application's object tree, with the knowledge that content might still be filling in and might cause incremental layout updates if the entire content is exposed as part of the UI. 为此，它是典型隔离或虚拟化从 XAML，任何以异步方式加载的对象并使用特定于应用程序逻辑或应用程序状态通知时处理。For this reason it is typical to isolate or virtualize any asynchronously loaded objects from XAML, and to use application-specific logic or application state to notify when is handled. 为了使若要加载的 XAML 输入以异步方式，在 XAML 标记中的根元素必须包含的属性和值`x:SynchronousMode="Async"`。In order for to load XAML input asynchronously, the root element in the XAML markup must contain the attribute and value `x:SynchronousMode="Async"`. 值被视为区分大小写。The value is treated as case sensitive. 如果 XAML 标记根不包含`x:SynchronousMode="Async"`，不会引发异常，且调用改为处理为同步负载 (请参阅)。If the XAML markup root does not contain `x:SynchronousMode="Async"`, no exception is thrown, and the call is instead processed as a synchronous load (see ). 每个实例只有一个异步加载操作类可以执行一次。Only one asynchronous load operation per instance of the class can be performed at a time. 如果多个异步操作，将尝试对同一个实例类引发。If more than one asynchronous operation is attempted on the same instance of the class an is thrown.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 对同一个 同时执行多个加载操作。

span.span: Multiple load operations are performed concurrently with the same .

MemberSignature.Value: public object LoadAsync (System.IO.Stream stream, System.Windows.Markup.ParserContext parserContext);
.method public hidebysig instance object LoadAsync(class System.IO.Stream stream, class System.Windows.Markup.ParserContext parserContext) cil managed
public: System::Object ^ LoadAsync(System::IO::Stream ^ stream, System::Windows::Markup::ParserContext ^ parserContext);

param.name: stream
param.span: 包含要加载的 XAML 输入的流。

span.span: A stream containing the XAML input to load.

param.name: parserContext
param.span: 由分析器使用的上下文信息。

span.span: Context information used by the parser.

summary.span: 读取指定 中的 XAML 输入，并返回相应对象树的根。

span.span: Reads the XAML input in the specified and returns the root of the corresponding object tree.
The root of the created object tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 异步的 XAML 加载操作最初将返回一个对象，它只是根对象。An asynchronous XAML load operation will initially return an object that is purely the root object. 异步，XAML 分析然后仍然存在，并在根目录下填充任何子对象。Asynchronously, XAML parsing then continues, and any child objects are filled in under the root. 这是典型的 WPF XAML 处理行为和该产品与对象生存期 WPF 概念交互相反。This is in contrast to the typical WPF XAML processing behavior and its interaction with WPF concepts of object lifetime. 中的典型 （非异步） 交互，返回一个元素并将其加载汇报之前都是包括所有子集合对象的所有属性。In the typical (non-async) interaction, all properties of an object including all child collections are filled before returning an element and reporting it as loaded. 该行为等同于自下而上的方法，用于创建的树的根对象所在的最后一个对象变为可用。That behavior equates to a bottom-up methodology for creating the tree where the root object is the last object to become available. 你通常会将返回的对象分配到应用程序的对象树中的某个位置、 内容所知识可能仍会填入和如果作为 UI 的一部分公开的整个内容，则可能会导致增量布局更新。You typically would assign the returned object to some location in your application's object tree, with the knowledge that content might still be filling in and might cause incremental layout updates if the entire content is exposed as part of the UI. 为此，它是典型隔离或虚拟化从 XAML，任何以异步方式加载的对象并使用特定于应用程序逻辑或应用程序状态通知时处理。For this reason it is typical to isolate or virtualize any asynchronously loaded objects from XAML, and to use application-specific logic or application state to notify when is handled. 为了使若要以异步方式加载标记，在 XAML 标记中的根元素必须包含的属性和值`x:SynchronousMode="Async"`。In order for to load markup asynchronously, the root element in the XAML markup must contain the attribute and value `x:SynchronousMode="Async"`. 值被视为区分大小写。The value is treated as case sensitive. 如果 XAML 标记根不包含`x:SynchronousMode="Async"`，不会引发异常，且调用处理为同步负载 (请参阅)。If the XAML markup root does not contain `x:SynchronousMode="Async"`, no exception is thrown, and the call is processed as a synchronous load (see ). 每个实例只有一个异步加载操作类可以执行一次。Only one asynchronous load operation per instance of the class can be performed at a time. 如果多个异步操作，将尝试对同一个实例类引发。If more than one asynchronous operation is attempted on the same instance of the class an is thrown.

exception.span: 对同一个 同时执行多个加载操作。

span.span: Multiple load operations are performed concurrently with the same .

summary.span: 在异步加载操作完成时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous load operation completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此外在异步加载操作中止时引发。 is also raised when an asynchronous load operation aborts.

summary.span: 读取指定文本字符串中的标记，并返回与指定标记的根对应的对象。

span.span: Reads the markup in the specified text string and returns an object that corresponds to the root of the specified markup.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig object Parse(string xamlText) cil managed
Public Shared Function Parse (xamlText As String) As Object

param.name: xamlText
param.span: 输入 XAML，作为单个文本字符串。

span.span: The input XAML, as a single text string.

summary.span: 读取指定文本字符串中的 XAML 输入，并返回与指定标记的根对应的对象。

span.span: Reads the XAML input in the specified text string and returns an object that corresponds to the root of the specified markup.
The root of the created object tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现调用内部后从字符串创建流。The implementation calls internally after creating a stream from the string. 请参阅有关其他信息，例如可能的异常。See for additional information such as possible exceptions.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object Parse (string xamlText, System.Windows.Markup.ParserContext parserContext);
.method public static hidebysig object Parse(string xamlText, class System.Windows.Markup.ParserContext parserContext) cil managed

param.name: xamlText
param.span: 输入 XAML，作为单个文本字符串。

span.span: The input XAML, as a single text string.

param.name: parserContext
param.span: 由分析器使用的上下文信息。

span.span: Context information used by the parser.

summary.span: （使用指定的 ）读取指定文本字符串中的 XAML 标记，并返回与指定标记的根对应的对象。

span.span: Reads the XAML markup in the specified text string (using a specified ) and returns an object that corresponds to the root of the specified markup.
The root of the created object tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现调用内部后从字符串创建流。The implementation calls internally after creating a stream from the string. 请参阅有关其他信息，例如可能的异常。See for additional information such as possible exceptions.
